job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a top-tier engineer who thrives on ownership, strategic influence, and tackling complex technical challenges? In this role, you will build the most important features of a product, all while shaping its technical direction and ensuring long-term stability and growth. Your technical decisions will directly impact the product and its users, giving you the autonomy to innovate and the responsibility to deliver.

You'll work on products that are transforming learning:

  • TeachTap: Leverages AI to bring historical figures to life in a TikTok-like learning experience.
  • TeachTales: Engages students with personalized, magical storytelling that boosts comprehension.
  • TimeBack: Acts as a learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, proactively coaching students.
  • Athena: Uses AI-generated videos and tests to deliver measurable academic outcomes.

You will drive the technical evolution of our products, ensuring they are scalable, maintainable, and robust for the long term. Collaborating closely with product teams, you will translate high-level requirements into technical design choices and solve complex challenges while maintaining high-quality standards. Your decisions will shape the product's future and influence how thousands of students learn and grow.

We prioritize thoughtful planning and up-front design. Our AI-first approach automates mundane tasks, freeing you to focus on high-impact decisions and problem-solving. You will have a high degree of autonomy and the ability to influence product direction and prioritize long-term stability and scalability.

If you're ready to lead the technical evolution of our SaaS products and leverage generative AI to push boundaries, we'd love to hear from you.

What you will be doing
  • Feature Development: Designing and implementing new features focusing on scalability, maintainability, and long-term product impact.
  • Requirement Engineering: Collaborating with the product team to refine requirements and leading technical discussions to align features with product goals.
  • Operations and Maintenance: Monitoring and maintaining product stability, tuning performance, and proactively identifying and resolving issues.
  • Technical Design: Making stakes technical decisions directly impacting user experiences and product scalability.
What you will NOT be doing
  • Switching between short-term projects or chasing the next hype-driven technology trend.
  • Working on internal IT systems or outsourced projects without real-world user impact.
  • Getting stuck in endless meetings or dealing with tedious infrastructure issues.
job_details.full_text:
Principal Software Engineer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Are you a top-tier engineer who thrives on ownership, strategic influence, and tackling complex technical challenges? In this role, you will build the most important features of a product, all while shaping its technical direction and ensuring long-term stability and growth. Your technical decisions will directly impact the product and its users, giving you the autonomy to innovate and the responsibility to deliver.

You'll work on products that are transforming learning:

  • TeachTap: Leverages AI to bring historical figures to life in a TikTok-like learning experience.
  • TeachTales: Engages students with personalized, magical storytelling that boosts comprehension.
  • TimeBack: Acts as a learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, proactively coaching students.
  • Athena: Uses AI-generated videos and tests to deliver measurable academic outcomes.

You will drive the technical evolution of our products, ensuring they are scalable, maintainable, and robust for the long term. Collaborating closely with product teams, you will translate high-level requirements into technical design choices and solve complex challenges while maintaining high-quality standards. Your decisions will shape the product's future and influence how thousands of students learn and grow.

We prioritize thoughtful planning and up-front design. Our AI-first approach automates mundane tasks, freeing you to focus on high-impact decisions and problem-solving. You will have a high degree of autonomy and the ability to influence product direction and prioritize long-term stability and scalability.

If you're ready to lead the technical evolution of our SaaS products and leverage generative AI to push boundaries, we'd love to hear from you.

What you will be doing
  • Feature Development: Designing and implementing new features focusing on scalability, maintainability, and long-term product impact.
  • Requirement Engineering: Collaborating with the product team to refine requirements and leading technical discussions to align features with product goals.
  • Operations and Maintenance: Monitoring and maintaining product stability, tuning performance, and proactively identifying and resolving issues.
  • Technical Design: Making stakes technical decisions directly impacting user experiences and product scalability.
What you will NOT be doing
  • Switching between short-term projects or chasing the next hype-driven technology trend.
  • Working on internal IT systems or outsourced projects without real-world user impact.
  • Getting stuck in endless meetings or dealing with tedious infrastructure issues.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and evolving SaaS products that leverage generative AI, specifically mentioning AI-generated videos, personalized storytelling, and AI copilots. The core responsibilities include feature development, technical design, and operations/maintenance of these AI-driven products, aligning with the definition of a GenAI Engineer who designs, develops, fine-tunes, and deploys applications built on generative models and focuses on user-facing software systems.

job_tasks.justification: The description repeatedly mentions 'build the most important features of a product', 'shaping its technical direction', 'ensuring long-term stability and growth', 'designing and implementing new features focusing on scalability, maintainability, and long-term product impact', and 'making stakes technical decisions directly impacting user experiences and product scalability'. This aligns with traditional software engineering tasks for building and deploying applications.
job_tasks.phrase: build the most important features of a product

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'Your technical decisions will directly impact the product and its users, giving you the autonomy to innovate and the responsibility to deliver.' and 'making stakes technical decisions directly impacting user experiences and product scalability.' This highlights the software development aspect of creating user-facing products.
job_tasks.phrase: Your technical decisions will directly impact the product and its users

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'drive the technical evolution of our products, ensuring they are scalable, maintainable, and robust for the long term' points to the software engineering responsibilities of maintaining and improving existing systems.
job_tasks.phrase: drive the technical evolution of our products

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'Collaborating closely with product teams, you will translate high-level requirements into technical design choices' and 'Requirement Engineering: Collaborating with the product team to refine requirements and leading technical discussions to align features with product goals.' This shows an understanding of business needs and translating them into technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating closely with product teams, you will translate high-level requirements into technical design choices

job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly mentions products like 'TeachTap: Leverages AI to bring historical figures to life', 'TeachTales: Engages students with personalized, magical storytelling', 'TimeBack: Acts as a learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, proactively coaching students', and 'Athena: Uses AI-generated videos and tests to deliver measurable academic outcomes.' The phrase 'leverage generative AI to push boundaries' directly indicates the use and development of generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: leverage generative AI to push boundaries

job_tasks.justification: The responsibilities include 'Operations and Maintenance: Monitoring and maintaining product stability, tuning performance, and proactively identifying and resolving issues.' This aligns with the operational aspects of keeping AI-powered products running smoothly in production.
job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring and maintaining product stability, tuning performance, and proactively identifying and resolving issues

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'Our AI-first approach automates mundane tasks, freeing you to focus on high-impact decisions and problem-solving' implies building and integrating AI into workflows, which is part of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Our AI-first approach automates mundane tasks

job_tasks.justification: The product 'Athena' uses 'AI-generated videos', which is a direct application of generative AI modeling.
The product 'TeachTales' uses 'personalized, magical storytelling', which is a generative AI task.
The product 'TimeBack' is described as a 'learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, proactively coaching students', indicating the use of AI for intelligent assistance and interaction.
The product 'TeachTap' 'Leverages AI to bring historical figures to life in a TikTok-like learning experience', suggesting AI-driven content generation or simulation.
job_tasks.phrase: Leverages AI to bring historical figures to life
